All codes in this table are from the system http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codes

  SB030ACan be used for ORIF, wherever indicated. Can not be used as an Add - on package
  SB032ASurgical Management for Type III & IV Rockwood to be decided by the surgeon on case to case basis Type V & VI to be taken up for Surgery straight away In case Type I or II is booked a Pop Up to be shown "For Rockwood Type I & II - AC Joint injury, experts recommend Medical Management, are you sure you want to do Surgical Correction in this case ?" For Hospitals booking Surgical Correction in Type I & Type II cases, Medical Audit will be conducted.
  SB032BSurgical Management for Type III & IV Rockwood to be decided by the surgeon on case to case basis Type V & VI to be taken up for Surgery straight away In case Type I or II is booked a Pop Up to be shown "For Rockwood Type I & II - AC Joint injury, experts recommend Medical Management, are you sure you want to do Surgical Correction in this case ?" For Hospitals booking Surgical Correction in Type I & Type II cases, Medical Audit will be conducted.
  SB032CSurgical Management for Type III & IV Rockwood to be decided by the surgeon on case to case basis Type V & VI to be taken up for Surgery straight away
  SB032DSurgical Management for Type III & IV Rockwood to be decided by the surgeon on case to case basis Type V & VI to be taken up for Surgery straight away
  SB032ESurgical Management for Type III & IV Rockwood to be decided by the surgeon on case to case basis Type V & VI to be taken up for Surgery straight away
  SB032FSurgical Management for Type III & IV Rockwood to be decided by the surgeon on case to case basis Type V & VI to be taken up for Surgery straight away
  SB070ALA for - K Wire & Screw GA for - Nail & Plate
  SC076AIf the Hospital choses Pediatric Port in a pt. aged more than 14 years. Then it should be audited
  SE012AThe package is inclusive of Eye Bank processing fee
  SE012BThis is a special follow up package, as in Corneal graft surgery, a follow up at 1 week is required. At this time, the surgeon has to examine and then prescribe medicine for next one month. The medicine for 1 month has to be given at the time of booking this package. A signed reciept from the pt. is an essential document
  SE018ATo be done only after a prior scleral buckling surgery history
  SE022ACan be booked only after 1 year of cataract surgery
  SE025ACan be booked as a complication of cataract surgery atleast 15 days after discharge
  SE029AThe procedure is done only once per eye and not repeated
  SE029B1. Claim to be raised after all 3 sittings have been done per eye. 2. The interval between subsequent sittings is atleast 1 week.
  SE033APre-auth to be raised only in cases which have a prior history of Vitreoretinal surgery done atleast 3 months ago
  SG097ACan be booked only after 15 days of Ileostomy and then every 2 months thereafter till the closure of stoma. The Hospital has to upload a signed statement from pt. that s/he has received the cosnumables: Ileostomy - bags, adhesive, clips etc for 2 months
  SG097BCan be booked only after 15 days of Colostomy and then every 2 months thereafter till the closure of stoma. The Hospital has to upload a signed statement from pt. that s/he has received the cosnumables: colostomy - bags, adhesive, clips etc for 2 months
  SU052APayment to be made after completion of one month.
  SU060AClaim to be raised after 6th Cycle
  SU060BClaim for Rs. 15,000 can be raised after 6th Cycle. Remainaing Rs. 15,000 can be claimed after 12th Cycle
  SU071CNo payment to be done to the Hospital for this stage The package can be booked only if the first stage package has been booked prior to this
  SU071DThe package can be booked only if the first stage and / or intermediate stage package has been booked prior to this
  SV032AAssociated with CABG Need to submit Barcode/ ID number of IABP. Intra-operative use of IABP as a part of operative strategy, not included Incidence - 5% to 7% Scrutiny of Hospitals where incidence is more than twice of prescribed limit

Can be used for ORIF, wherever indicated.
Can not be used as an Add - on package

Surgical Management for Type III & IV Rockwood to be decided by the surgeon on case to case basis
Type V & VI to be taken up for Surgery straight away
In case Type I or II is booked a Pop Up to be shown "For Rockwood Type I & II - AC Joint injury, experts recommend Medical Management, are you sure you want to do Surgical Correction in this case ?" 
For Hospitals booking Surgical Correction in Type I & Type II cases, Medical Audit will be conducted.

Surgical Management for Type III & IV Rockwood to be decided by the surgeon on case to case basis

In case Type I or II is booked a Pop Up to be shown "For Rockwood Type I & II - AC Joint injury, experts recommend Medical Management, are you sure you want to do Surgical Correction in this case ?" 
For Hospitals booking Surgical Correction in Type I & Type II cases, Medical Audit will be conducted.

LA for - K Wire & Screw
GA for - Nail & Plate
If the Hospital choses Pediatric Port in a pt. aged more than 14 years. Then it should be audited
The package is inclusive of Eye Bank processing fee

This is a special  follow up package, as in Corneal graft surgery, a follow up at 1 week is required.
At this time, the surgeon has to examine and then prescribe medicine for next one month.
The medicine for 1 month has to be given at the time of booking this package.
A signed reciept from the pt. is an essential document
To be done only after a prior scleral buckling surgery history
Can be booked only after 1 year of cataract surgery
Can be booked as a complication of cataract surgery atleast 15 days after discharge
The procedure is done only once per eye and not repeated

1. Claim to be raised after all 3 sittings have been done per eye.
2. The interval between subsequent sittings is atleast 1 week.
Pre-auth to be raised only in cases which have a prior history of Vitreoretinal surgery done atleast 3 months ago

Can be booked only after 15 days of Ileostomy and then every 2 months thereafter till the closure of stoma.
The Hospital has to upload a signed statement from pt. that s/he has received the cosnumables: Ileostomy - bags, adhesive, clips etc for 2 months

Can be booked only after 15 days of Colostomy and then every 2 months thereafter till the closure of stoma.
The Hospital has to upload a signed statement from pt. that s/he has received the cosnumables: colostomy - bags, adhesive, clips etc for 2 months
Payment to be made after completion of one month.
Claim to be raised after 6th Cycle

Claim for Rs. 15,000 can be raised after 6th Cycle.
Remainaing Rs. 15,000 can be claimed after 12th Cycle

No payment to be done to the Hospital for this stage
The package can be booked only if the first stage package has been booked prior to this
The package can be booked only if the first stage and / or intermediate stage package has been booked prior to this

Associated with CABG
Need to submit Barcode/ ID number of IABP. Intra-operative use of IABP as a part of operative strategy, not included
Incidence - 5% to 7%
Scrutiny of Hospitals where incidence is more than twice of prescribed limit
